XIV.4.B.5.
d
.
Deficiencies
If any unresolved deficiencies are noted during the reporting period, the RO management analyst (or designee) will
annotate the current
IRS
IIR
with the projected date of resolution of the deficiencies, and
in the next annual
IRS
IIR
, document the action taken to resolve the deficiencies.
title: M21-1, Part XIV, Chapter 4, Section B - Federal Tax Information (FTI) Match: Safeguarding
